caption: Table 1: Performance comparison.
description: This table compares the performance of MeLLoC against several state-of-the-art compression algorithms (ALP, FPZIP, ZFP, Blosc, Gzip, Zstandard) using two key metrics: compression ratio and throughput.  The compression ratio indicates the efficiency of data reduction, with higher values representing more compact representations. Throughput measures the speed of compression and decompression processes, which is crucial for handling large scientific datasets. The comparison is done on two datasets: CESM-ATM and Hurricane.
